meanings.sent1: The radiophoto showed the beautiful sunset from far away.
meanings.sent2: I received a radiophoto of the rare bird species from the research team.
meanings.sent3: The radiophoto of the cat wearing sunglasses made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a radiophoto, clear and vivid in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The radiophoto of the mountain peak took my breath away with its detail.

meanings.definition: To transmit a photograph by radio.
meanings.sent1: They radiophotoed the image of the new building to the headquarters.
meanings.sent2: We need to radiophoto the map to the team for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The astronauts radiophotoed their group picture back to Earth.
meanings.sent4: His words radiophotoed the scene into my mind with perfect clarity.
meanings.sent5: The technology allows us to radiophoto important documents instantly.
